page.title: 01Our D-Block The Corvedale
page.content:
{ Our Domesday Block is a rural area in the Corvedale between the towns of {Ludlow}and{Much Wenlock.}It is mostly agricultural land with mixed farms of sheep,and beef and arable farming.
There are two very old villages on our D-Block,{Diddlebury}and{Aston Mu- {nslow.}There are no Hotels,sports or leisure centres or anything like that but there are two inns,a guest house and some holiday cottages.
The most important buildings in the D-Block are{Corvedale C.E. School,St {Peters Church Diddlebury}and the { {White House Museum,Aston Munslow. }
The Village Hall, Diddlebury, is an important community feature and is used for many recreational and leisure activities.
